TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content: I believe in a .24 release today!!!
Is this the most hype there has ever been for a update? It sure seems so!
Hype level over 9000 is real. Those pages just keep skipping by O_O

check steam db KSP

last update 2 minutes ago

Scratchpad is bad news guys. Not good news. Means the did a test upload with changes. Changes are bad. It means they fixed something. Then you need a test build afterwards.

Scratchpad2 is bad news - we think just scratchpad is good.
Scratchpad being updated.

Scratchpad is bad news guys. Not good news. Means the did a test upload with changes. Changes are bad. It means they fixed something. Then you need a test build afterwards.

Have we ever gotten confirmation on what the scratchpad is?
Nope,last time with 0.23.5 they went to stratchpad and then released,Or I dunno.

Scratchpad is bad news guys. Not good news. Means the did a test upload with changes. Changes are bad. It means they fixed something. Then you need a test build afterwards.

I thought that was scratchpad2?

what is scratchpad?

It's the lowest level of a development upload. Comes before test build. And test build comes before a release candidate.

Hype Factor 9, Mr. Sulu!!

(ooooh myyyyy~)
It's linux scratchpad anyways.
Of the previous 9 updates I've witnessed, this is the most hype I've seen.
I can't take it anymore!

I'm actually not on the hypetrain and don't want to get on just yet. I want to complete my last two (sandbox) projects in 0.23.5, then do a clean reinstall. Said projects are taking a Kerbal to the face on Duna (he's about 17 km away, but on an incredibly unstable, crash prone rover) and landing a probe on Pol (currently in orbit).
No longer free in Germany.
ARM update was released around 4:30 or so so its not over yet!

Of the previous 9 updates I've witnessed, this is the most hype I've seen.

I've only seen a few myself, but I am definitely the most excited about this one..
My own personal hype is surreal right now, I dont think ive ever been this hyped for a game. I'm more hyped than when XCOM came out.
PC Scratchpad...
Scartchpad hype!

Of the previous 9 updates I've witnessed, this is the most hype I've seen.

Remember back when KSP downloads were hosted on the KSP servers. Imagine if they still self-hosted.
It's only about 2:30PM Squad time. So they've still got a couple hours.
http://cdn.head-fi.org/d/d2/d2aa550c_boldstate-hype-train.png
